result.translation: (1) When the victory of Allāh has come and the conquest,[2005]

result.arabic_text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
result.translation: (2) And you see the people entering into the religion of Allāh in multitudes,

result.arabic_text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
result.translation: (3) Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of Repentance.[2006]
